author: sky.cactus
content: It'll keep running as long as it runs because it is censorship resistant and we can't turn it off, but it isn't receiving anymore updates I believe.

author: ajsutton
content: It'll keep running because there's a bunch of client teams and the EF still running validators for it too... If we want to kill it we should probably stop doing that.

author: sky.cactus
content: This wouldn't actually stop it though, it would just stop finalizing until enough validators leak out right?  Then it would go back to finalizing with the remaining validators.

author: ajsutton
content: It would massively cripple it given we run something like 90% of the validators.  It would continue progressing and leak out that 90% eventually but in the mean time would miss 90% of the blocks which will significantly reduce its usability.
